document.topic_text: NEWS IN ENGLISH Apr 24, 2016 | 19:15 pm BRIDGEPORT, Conn. - The Marlies' power play couldn't get it done on Sunday, so Connor Brown got to work on the penalty kill. Brown scored what turned into the game winner while shorthanded and Garret Sparks made 31 saves as[…] Canada’s National Men’s Under-18 Team falls to United States in bronze medal game News Apr 24, 2016 | 19:10 pm Canada’s National Men’s Under-18 Team closed out the 2016 IIHF U18 World Championship on Sunday afternoon, dropping a 10-3 decision to the United States in the bronze-medal game at Ralph Engelstad Arena.
